name: Trigger (itch)
description:
Wendy, a 30-something housewife, uncovers a mystery from her past that may undo her marriage—and her sanity. An interactive story with multiple endings that reveal different aspects of Wendy's past.

  • Short playthrough with multiple endings.
  • No "win" or "lose" path. Each story branch gives a different window into Wendy's past, and shows different possibilities for her future.
  • A bold art style, displayed in 720p.
  • Gorgeous soundtrack with live instruments.

Buy the soundtrack here.

Story may be upsetting to some players for depictions of PTSD and abuse.
